original_text: The men of Ai looked back and saw the smoke of the city rising up into the sky, but they had no chance to escape in any direction; the Israelites who had been fleeing toward the wilderness had turned back against their pursuers.
korean_text: 아이 사람이 뒤를 돌아본즉 그 성읍에 연기가 하늘에 닿은 것이 보이니 이 길로도 저 길로도 도망할 수 없이 되었고 광야로 도망하던 이스라엘 백성은 그 추격하던 자에게로 돌아섰더라

sentences.original_text: The men of Ai looked back
and saw the smoke of the city rising up
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성의 연기가 오르는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: but they had no chance to escape
the Israelites who had been fleeing
had turned back against their pursuers
